item.title: No Ads!
item.description: I just shelled out to wordpress.com to buy the No Ads upgrade. I think they’re good people. I hope you all appreciate it. Let me know if you do. Happy hacking, James You can hire James and his team at m9rx corporation. You can follow James on Mastodon for more frequent updates and other random thoughts. You can follow James on Twitter for more frequent updates and other random thoughts. You can support James on GitHub if you'd like to help sustain this kind of content.
